attributes.action: We the people demand that our vote is respected and leave the EU without a deal!
attributes.additional_details: WE VOTED OUT! WE VOTED TO HAVE OUR COUNTRY BACK! WE VOTED TO LEAVE BUREAUCRACY, WE VOTED TO CONTROL OUR BORDERS, WE VOTED TO PUT THE BRITISH PEOPLE FIRST, WE VOTED TO MAKE OUR OWN DEALS! WAKE UP PEOPLE! GOVERNMENT, SORT IT OUT AND RESPECT THE PEOPLE OR FACE A BITTER REVOLUTION!
attributes.background: In 2016, this country voted to leave the EU. We didn't vote to leave with a deal. We voted to leave no matter what. Parliament is in the process of shutting down what the people voted for and this needs to stop! The speaker and most of the house are bias against Brexit & democracy! No Deal, WTO NOW!
